page.title: 16MY HOME IN LONGNEWTON
page.content: I HAVE{ONE BROTHER}WHO IS 6,{A SISTER WHO IS 4 AND A DOG WHO IS 1.I ALSO HAVE TWO GRANDMAS,ONE 79 AND ONE 60, AND A GRANDAD WHO IS 65.I AM 8.MY MUM IS 36 AND MY DAD IS 37. MY DAD WORKS AT{CAMERON'S BREWERY WHERE HE IS AN{ACCOUNTANT.}MY MUM WORKS AT{PLAYSCHOOL}WHERE SHE IS A {PLAY LEADER.}MY GRANDPARENTS DO NOT WORK. THEY ARE RETIRED SO THEY ARE {PENSIONERS. OUR HOUSE HAS{CENTRAL HEATING}AND AN OUTSIDE TAP.WE HAVE ELEVEN ROOMS AND TWO TOILETS.I HAVE A BEDROOM OF MY OWN.WE HAVE{PATIO WINDOWS.}OUR GARDEN IS SEVENTEEN PACES LONG AND THIRTEEN PACES WIDE.THE ROOMS ARE A BATHROOM,A SMALL LIVING ROOM AND A BIG ONE,A CLOAKROOM,A KITCHEN,FOUR BEDROOMS,A LOBBY AND A HALL.
